tool_description: Perform accurate and hassle-free conversions between various measurement units for weight, length, area, volume, speed, fuel, pressure, and temperature with our API. It supports local units and returns both the converted value and abbreviation (if available) for quick and easy integration into your projects.
name: Unit Measurement Conversion
title: Unit Measurement Conversion

api_list.name: Convert a Unit
api_list.description: GET the Unit and Value you want to convert, and get a object with the result and abbreviation (if available).

api_list.name: Get a List of All Units
api_list.description: This endpoint gets a full list of units available for conversion
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://unit-measurement-conversion.p.rapidapi.com/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "unit-measurement-conversion.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://unit-measurement-conversion.p.rapidapi.com/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "unit-measurement-conversion.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
